snippet: Factory owners said a proposed increase, nearly doubling wages, was too high, while labor leaders said it was not enough.
abstract: Bangladesh takes a first step to raise wages in its garment industry with a special government-appointed board voting to nearly double the minimum wage; factory owners complain that the increase is too high, while labor leaders say it is too low.
lead_paragraph: Factory owners said a proposed increase, nearly doubling wages, was too high, while labor leaders said it was not enough.

headline.main: Bangladesh Takes Step to Increase Lowest Pay
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh Takes Step To Increase Lowest Pay
